title: Echoes of the Architect
outcome: Leaked Halden correspondences reveal Council complicity in BCI abuses and deliberate erasures. Public occupations begin, disgraced officials flee, communities debate BCI’s fate. The city grapples with truth, justice, and the legacy of control.

events.description: A trove of Halden's secret messages is discovered in Tower 9, revealing explicit warnings to the Council about BCI’s bias and deliberate cover-ups.
Rada and Oksana release selected messages to the public, proving the Council’s active role in BCI-driven erasures and suppression.
Citizens occupy key Council offices, demand public trials, and force several disgraced officials into hiding. Communities openly debate dismantling BCI hardware.
Conflicting proposals arise: preserve compromised BCI systems as a warning for future generations, or destroy all traces to prevent abuse.
A citywide memorial is held for the Vanished. Former BCI architects admit systemic flaws, and assemblies begin the process of archiving Halden’s legacy.
